dmca.title: [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Navinet at http://www.garrygreen.net/internet-access--int
dmca.body:
t

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 25, 2006 12:55 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; administrator-106@legal-notification.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Navinet at
http://www.garrygreen.net/internet-access--internet-access-services
[IFID:AGX81]]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Navinet at
http://www.garrygreen.net/internet-access--internet-access-services
[IFID:AGX81]
Date:         Wed, 25 Jan 2006 11:17:46 -0500
From:         Legal Administrator <administrator-106@legal-notification.com>
Reply-To:         Legal Administrator
<administrator-106@legal-notification.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Dear Administrative Contact:

I am writing to advise you that you are hosting a site at
http://www.garrygreen.net/internet-access--internet-access-services that
contains a trademark violation for my client, Water, inc, a company based in
Carson, California, USA. Water, inc. is the owner of the Everhot R,
EvercoldR, EverbrewR, EnviropureR, NavinetR and Water, inc R trademarks and
associated domain names. I have attempted to remove this infraction by
delivering two notifications of Cease and Desist to the e-mail of record
however the domain owner refuses to remove the infraction.

The domain owner of this site is deliberately trying to cause customer
confusion by using Water, inc.'s trademarks to divert web traffic away from
Water, inc's website at www.waterinc.com. This action constitutes trademark
infringement and unfair competition. I am therefore asking for your
assistance in having the domain owner remove all references to Water, inc.'s
trademarks from their site. I truly appreciate your co-operation in this
matter and hope to hear from you at your earliest convenience.

Sincerely,


Trademark Department
Water, inc.
Legal Administrator <administrator-106@legal-notification.com>
[IFID:AGX81]

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFD18l2vK/XpJs6oyURAsjEAJ9x4TTu4Vx5PrQmfi3IC6PvHzu8KwCeKkWq
OGnE/BPCEHbav7JmE7awIKc=
=Cy+O
